channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Second Thoughts: Can Michael Jordan, Denny Hamlin, NASCAR Mend Relationships?
item.description: After the NASCAR antitrust trial ended, much chatter has centered on what fences can be mended and which are not fixable. We take a look.

item.title: 2026 College Football Odds: Can James Franklin, VA Tech Win Total Set at 7.5
item.description: Will James Franklin lead the Hokies to a winning season in 2026? Here's what the early odds say.

item.title: The Big Picture: Bo Nix, Trevor Lawrence Took Divergent Paths to Top 10 QB Status
item.description: Trevor Lawrence and Bo Nix have never played better football. Ahead of their first matchup on Sunday, let's look at how they got here.

item.title: 2026 MLB Free Agent Signings, Trades: Guardians DFA Once Promising Outfielder
item.description: Keeping tabs on all of MLB's notable free agency signings, trades, and extensions ahead of the 2026 season.

item.title: Julian Edelman Remains Skeptical of Patriots Super Bowl Chances: 'Not There Yet'
item.description: Julian Edelman on the New England Patriots Super Bowl chances: "They're not there yet."

item.title: Dolphins bench Tua, will start Ewers vs. Bengals
item.description: The Dolphins are benching quarterback Tua Tagovailoa and turning to rookie Quinn Ewers as their new starter.

item.title: Ohio fires coach Smith over 'serious' misconduct
item.description: Ohio University has fired football coach Brian Smith for cause, saying he violated his contract by "engaging in serious professional misconduct and pa...

item.title: Sources: FSG to sell Penguins to Hoffmann family
item.description: Fenway Sports Group has agreed in principle to sell the Pittsburgh Penguins to the Chicago-based Hoffmann family, sources confirmed to ESPN.

item.title: Nacua: Refs 'the worst,' make calls to get on TV
item.description: The Rams' Puka Nacua said on a livestream Tuesday night that he thinks some NFL referees make calls just to get shown on TV during games.

item.title: Mahomes begins rehab, eyes Week 1 return
item.description: Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes has begun rehab following surgery to repair two torn ligaments in his left knee, and the team is optimistic the two-time MVP...
